heading: HB02127
0: AN ACT DECLARING CERTAIN LANDS OF THE PUBLIC DOMAIN, LOCATED IN THE MUNICIPALITIES OF BANTAYAN, DAANBANTAYAN, MADRIDEJOS AND STA. FE, ALL IN THE PROVINCE OF CEBU, AS AGRICULTURAL LAND OPEN TO DISPOSITION FOR AGRICULTURAL, COMMERCIAL, RESIDENTIAL, TOURISM AND OTHER SIMILAR PRODUCTIVE PURPOSES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE PRESIDENTIAL PROCLAMATION NO. 2151, 'DECLARING CERTAIN ISLANDS AND/OR PARTS OF THE COUNTRY AS WILDERNESS AREAS,' DATED DECEMBER 29, 1981, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2018-07-31, transmitted to the Senate on 2018-08-02 and received by the Senate on 2018-08-02 Substituted by HB07472
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02127
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING CERTAIN LANDS OF THE PUBLIC DOMAIN, LOCATED IN THE MUNICIPALITIES OF BANTAYAN, DAANBANTAYAN, MADRIDEJOS AND STA. FE, ALL IN THE PROVINCE OF CEBU, AS AGRICULTURAL LAND OPEN TO DISPOSITION FOR AGRICULTURAL, COMMERCIAL, RESIDENTIAL, TOURISM AND OTHER SIMILAR PRODUCTIVE PURPOSES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE PRESIDENTIAL PROCLAMATION NO. 2151, 'DECLARING CERTAIN ISLANDS AND/OR PARTS OF THE COUNTRY AS WILDERNESS AREAS,' DATED DECEMBER 29, 1981, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
